name: Blob N Roll
description:
As we are siblings, we have closely worked together on this project. 

Hi! I’m Maria, I’m a 22-year-old and I have just finished my Game Design study program. I have worked with Unity for about four years now and am happy to show what I have learned in this Game Jam. I wrote the game’s code, implemented to Assets & the UI and made the VFX/Shaders/Materials for the game. Everything I did in the project was created during the jam.

Hello, Daniel here. I am 20 years old and currently working as a web designer. My job was to create the art for the game - this includes the initial concepts, 3D models, textures, UI, artwork, sound effects as well as music. On the last day of the jam, I also focused on the presentation of the game online. The game assets were created in blender, the music was made in GarageBand. We have used sound effects from online sources that require no crediting.    

Thank you for playing and commenting!
